Name: Silk Stocking
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: So smooooooth but still retains a tequila bite and a hint of chocolate and fruit.
History: This recipe is from Ryan Chetiyawardana in 2009, who shared his recipe at The Cabinet Room, London during the UK finals of that year's World Class bartending competition . The Silk Stocking originated in the late 1970s - early 1980s, and the earliest cocktail book I've seen it referenced is as a blended cocktail in Helen Spence's 1982 book Cocktails For Two .
Nutrition: One serving of Silk Stocking contains 261 calories
